very cute shirt, the material is a bit itchy though
Size was pretty good, and it fit wonderfully! but the fabric was unbearably itchy even after a wash.  Soaking it in fabric softener for a few hours sorta helped, but it's still kinda scratchy.

I didn't get to wear it though. I tried it on..it fit good. The material was very nice, stretchy. Not seeing through at all. Nice v neck. Mine disappeared during a move. The brown was a deep brown the striping very small. Cute
Its a bit big but if i chose a small then it would most likely be too tight. The quality overall is pretty nice, its better than the other similar tank tops ive gotten.

It’s exactly my style! I love to layer it or wear it just as is! It’s simple yet cute! I’m excited to see what other ways I can style it! Like layering an off the shoulder sweater with it! The quality is good and it’s great as a basic.
Really cute , but it seems to be childrens sizing. My 11 year old is 110 pounds and is 5 ' 1 and needed a large
This is shorter than I thought it would be. I'm not one for having my belly hang out or having a super tight shirt but this is soft and cute under overalls.

I ordered an XL womens tank and what arrived fits like it's a girls XL. It is VERY tight and very short. I might wear it as a sleep tank during the summer but no one wile ever see me wear such a teeny tiny shirt which is a shame because I really like the lace edges and colors of the stripes.
Horrible fabric (I purchased the strip)!  No stretch & fabric itchy.  Would not buy!
This talk is cute, it runs small and is short
This is not for adults. I ordered the XL based on the size guide and it's not even close. It fits my fairly petite 9 year old niece. Don't waste your money.

Came on time, just how i ordered it. Looks amazing, and is comfortable, would buy again !!!
